content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the case involved a matrimonial property dispute between two parties the court partially upheld the defendants counterclaim and ordered them to compensate the applicant for a larger share of the property acquired during the marriage the court also ordered the applicant to pay the defendant for nonmaterial damage the legal text discusses various articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the court considered the interests of the minor children the health and financial situation of the spouses and other relevant circumstances in dividing the property the court awarded the apartment to the applicant due to their special needs and ordered the defendant to pay compensation the court also divided other shared property and recognized the defendants personal ownership of a vehicle
